Custom VIP 2022 Canadian Grand Prix Packages

Every race fan should have the pleasure of attending the beloved Canadian Grand Prix. Allow us to curate a travel package to help you experience this long-running race in style. Our Canadian Grand Prix experiences are tailor-made for each guest with preferred race viewing (premium grandstand or a fully-catered exclusive hospitality paddock), luxury accommodations in the heart of Montreal and more. You can complete your ideal itinerary with private race transportation, pit tours, tickets to additional events, and any other extras that will make your experience absolutely perfect. Luxury packages to the 2022 Canadian Grand Prix are available from $4,055 (premium grandstand seating) or $12,075 (exclusive hospitality) per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 Canadian Grand Prix

As one of the most popular stops on the Formula 1 tour, the Canadian Grand Prix is a highlight of spring. In 2022, the sport’s greatest drivers will once again converge in Montreal, Quebec for another exciting edition of the Grand Prix du Canada, and you could be there to experience the thrill of this incredible event. Along with the Grand Prix festivities, experience Montreal’s famous shopping, dining, entertainment, and nightlife. For race fans and locals alike, it is one of the most memorable weekends of the year. After the 2020 and 2021 races were cancelled due to COVID-19, the 2022 Grand Prix will be a celebration three years in the making.
